ValidationRule.description: Chain cannot be edited and saved without assigning FSM.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF(AND(ShippingCountry = 'US', FS_FSM_Reviewer__c ="",RecordType.Name = "FS Chain",NOT(CONTAINS($Label.Exclude_User,$Profile.Name)), NOT(OR($Profile.Name = "System Administrator", $Profile.Name = "FET System Admin", $Profile.Name = "FS Admin PM_P",$Profile.Name = "CCR Sales Manager- CFV"))),TRUE,FALSE)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must assign an CCFS Reviewer before saving a Chain account.
